alert.note: Alert for Fremont (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 30 at 6:32PM MDT until July 30 at 6:45PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN NATRONA AND EAST CENTRAL FREMONT COUNTIES... At 632 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Castle Gardens, which is also 29 miles southeast of Shoshoni, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Ervay and Castle Gardens. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
